description:
Advanced civil engineering design projects with Civil Engineering and Architecture students working in authentic integrated design teams.
[Note students will be required to meet costs associated with copying of design reports prior to submission.]
incompatible: CIVL4510 or CIVL4530 or CIVL4513 or CIVL4511 or CIVL4512 or CIVL4516
restricted: 100 students maximum. Enrolment by approval of HoS after submission of written application & Minimum GPA of 5.0 in the following courses (CIVL2330 + CIVL2360 + CIVL2340 + CIVL3340 + CIVL3350)
